Name.description: A user-facing, friendly name for the CLI. Shown in help output and documentation headers.

Tokens.description: All valid CLI tokens (aliases) that can invoke this tool. Examples: ["openindustrial", "oi"]

Version.description: The current version of the CLI. Used in logs, help, and update flows.

Description.description: Optional description for the CLI. Shown in help output.

Commands.description: Relative or absolute path to the root folder of command modules. Defaults to "./commands".
